T02D2578:44b-1: bo dhi tsi tta bh'a ba aartha dva da sha nir de sha /
T02D2578:44b-3: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa don bcu gnyis bstan pa /
T02D2578:44b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo /
T02D2578:44b-5: 'dir byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa ni /
T02D2578:44b-6: don bcu gnyis kyis ston te /
T02D2578:44b-8: ci'i phyir rtogs par bya ba dang /
T02D2578:44b-9: ci zhig rtogs par bya ba dang //
T02D2578:44b-10: gang gis rtogs par bya ba dang //
T02D2578:44b-11: gang la brtags te rtogs par bya ba dang /
T02D2578:44b-12: brtags nas nges pa'i don bstan pa dang /
T02D2578:44b-13: nges pa'i don la bsgom pa dang //
T02D2578:44b-14: brgyud pa'i thabs kyis nges pa'i don rtogs par bya ba dang /
T02D2578:44b-15: byang chub kyi sems kyis ma zin na rnam par
T02D2578:44b-16: grol ba mi thob cing dge ba chud za bar
T02D2578:44b-17: bstan pa dang / mos pa tsam skyes pas kyang yon tan mang po thob pa dang /
T02D2578:44b-18: log par zhugs pa rnams la snying rje skye ba'i gnas su bstan pa dang /
T02D2578:44b-19: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba rnams so //
T02D2578:44b-20: de la phyag 'tshal ba la yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2578:44b-21: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gsum la phyag 'tshal ba ni /
T02D2578:45a-1: bshes gnyen gyis brtsams pa la bgegs mi 'jug cing
T02D2578:45a-2: mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa
T02D2578:45a-3: gcig gis bstan pa yin te /
T02D2578:45a-4: de la sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba ni /
T02D2578:45a-5: bdag med gnyis nyid bde gshegs mi rtog ye shes chos dbyings sku brnyes pa //
T02D2578:45a-7: gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa gnyis nyid
T02D2578:45a-8: ma nor bar rtogs pa ni bde bar gshegs pa'i
T02D2578:45a-9: mi rtog pa'i ye shes yin te /
T02D2578:45a-10: ye shes de thob pas de'i shes bya de chos
T02D2578:45a-11: kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad pa'i sku yang brnyes
T02D2578:45a-12: pa'o // chos la phyag 'tshal ba ni /
T02D2578:45a-13: kun gyi rang bzhin zhi ba 'di la bsal zhing blang med lam mchog ste //
T02D2578:45a-15: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2578:45a-16: rnam par byang ba kun gyi rang bzhin ni //
T02D2578:45a-17: spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad zhi ba ste /
T02D2578:45a-18: 'di la skyon bsal zhing yon tan blang du med de /
T02D2578:45a-19: blang dor med pa ni thar ba'i lam gyi nang na mchog yin no //
T02D2578:45a-21: mi ldog sa la sogs pa'i dbang bcu rgyal ba kun dang gcig brnyes pa //
T02D2578:45a-22: zhes pa smos pa yin te /
T02D2578:45a-23: sa dang po 'khor bar mi ldog / sa brgyad pa mtshan mar mi ldog pa la sogs te /
T02D2578:45a-24: sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2578:45a-25: ni tshe la dbang ba dang las la dbang ba
T02D2578:45a-26: dang / yo byad la dbang ba la sogs te /
T02D2578:45a-27: dbang bcu thob pas rgyal ba kun dang chos kyi dbyings rtogs par gcig pas gcig brnyes pa'o //
T02D2578:45a-28: gnas gsum mnyam nyid de la mtshan med yid kyis rab tu dad pas mos //
T02D2578:45a-29: zhes smos pa la phyag gi gnas ni dkon mchog gsum mo //
T02D2578:45a-30: chos nyid ni ma nor ba'i lam yin te /
T02D2578:45a-31: shes par bya ba yin la /
T02D2578:45a-32: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ni de shes par byed pa yin te /
T02D2578:45a-33: shes pa dang shes bya khyad par med ces 'byung bas mnyam pa dang /
T02D2578:45a-34: don dam par gnyis su med pas mnyam pa de
T02D2578:45a-35: la mtshan mar mi 'dzin pa'i yid kyis dang pa'i
T02D2578:45a-36: dad pa dang / don ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2578:45a-37: nges par bzung ba'i mos pas phyag 'tshal ba yin
T02D2578:45a-38: dad pa dang / no // don gnyis pa ston te /
T02D2578:45a-41: phan yon che ba'i phyir te /
T02D2578:45a-42: phan yon yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2578:45a-43: rgyur gnas pa'i phan yon dang /
T02D2578:45b-0: mngon du gyur pa 'bras bu'i @45b khyad par gyi phan yon dang /
T02D2578:45b-1: rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thams cad kyi gzhi lam gyi mchog tu bstan pa'o //
T02D2578:45b-2: de la rgyur gnas pa'i phan yon ni /
T02D2578:45b-3: ston pa 'jig rten sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis mtshungs par rab bsngags la //
T02D2578:45b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2578:45b-5: lha dang mi la sogs pa'i ston pa 'jig rten
T02D2578:45b-6: phyi nang gi mun pa sel ba'i ye shes kyi
T02D2578:45b-7: sgron mar gyur pa kun gyis kyang 'dra zhing mtshungs
T02D2578:45b-8: par byang chub kyi sems la phan yon che bar
T02D2578:45b-9: bsngags te / ji skad du bsngags she na /
T02D2578:45b-10: chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i snying po 'di //
T02D2578:45b-11: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung /
T02D2578:45b-12: chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni ye nas gnas pa'i chos kun gyi snying por gyur pa ni /
T02D2578:45b-13: 'jam dpal gzhon nu zhes bya ste /
T02D2578:45b-15: zug rngu med pa'i phyir 'jam pa dang /
T02D2578:45b-16: de rtogs na sems can kun gyi dpal du gyur pa dang /
T02D2578:45b-17: gzhom pa ni gtsang ba'i don te /
T02D2578:45b-18: skyon dang dri mas ma gos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2578:45b-19: snying po gong du bstan pa nyid chos rnams kyi snying po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2578:45b-21: byang chub kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid ma nor bar rtogs pa ni /
T02D2578:45b-22: sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir //
T02D2578:45b-23: bder gshegs ma lus yum du gyur pa rgyal ba kun gyi lam gcig go //
T02D2578:45b-25: lam 'di ma rtogs par lam gzhan gyis 'tshang mi rgya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2578:45b-26: tshul khrims la sogs pha rol phyin lam spyod pa gya mtsho'i gzhir gyur pa //
T02D2578:45b-27: tshul khrims la sogs te pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2578:45b-28: bcu dang dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang chub chub
T02D2578:45b-29: kyi sems kyis ma zin na /
T02D2578:45b-30: sangs rgyas 'grub pa'i tshogs su mi 'grub pas /
T02D2578:45b-31: sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad kyi gzhi yin par yang ston to //
T02D2578:45b-32: mngon du gyur te 'bras bu'i dus na yang khyad par du 'phags par bstan pa ni /
T02D2578:45b-33: rnam dag byang chub sems kyi dang tshul bsgom dang yon tan khyad par ni //
T02D2578:45b-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2578:45b-35: spro ba rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin nam /
T02D2578:45b-36: ngang tshul ma nor bar bsgoms te /
T02D2578:45b-38: yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta bu dag thob
T02D2578:45b-39: ce na blo dang ldan na nam zhig sems kyi
T02D2578:45b-40: dam pa de ni mngon du gyur pa na /
T02D2578:46a-0: @46a * // de la sku gsum mchog tu gyur pa chos kyi sku zhes rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D2578:46a-1: shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pas byang chub kyi
T02D2578:46a-2: sems mngon du gyur pa de la longs spyod rdzogs
T02D2578:46a-4: sku gsum gyi nang na mchog tu gyur pa chos
T02D2578:46a-5: kyi sku zhes byad chub kyi sems de la bya
T02D2578:46a-6: ste / byang chub kyi sems de la yon tan
T02D2578:46a-7: dang legs pa thams cad kyi gzhi ni chos kyi
T02D2578:46a-8: sku yin pas mchog tu gyur pa yin no //
T02D2578:46a-9: shes byed dam par gyur pas shes rab spyan zhes kyang ni de la bya //
T02D2578:46a-10: shes bya thams cad shes par byed pa'i nang na /
T02D2578:46a-11: dam pa ni shes rab kyi spyan yin te /
T02D2578:46a-13: shes bya kun gyi nang na chos thams cad kyi
T02D2578:46a-14: snying por gyur pa'i chos nyid ni dam pa yin
T02D2578:46a-15: pas / de rtogs pa'i shes byed kyang dam pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2578:46a-16: sha'i spyan dang lha'i spyan la sogs te /
T02D2578:46a-17: spyan lnga'i nang na yang byang chub kyi sems mngon
T02D2578:46a-18: du gyur pa'i mtshan nyid shes rab kyi spyan ni
T02D2578:46a-19: mchog tu gyur pa yin no //
T02D2578:46a-20: rdo rje rtse mo mchog nyid mi rtog ye shes de yang de nyid do //
T02D2578:46a-21: rdo rje ni sra ba dang gcod pa ste /
T02D2578:46a-22: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis mi shigs pa'i phyir sra ba dang /
T02D2578:46a-23: sgrib pa thams cad gcod cing spong ba yin pas ye shes la bya ste /
T02D2578:46a-24: so sor kun du rtog pa dang /
T02D2578:46a-25: bya ba nan tan la sogs pa ye shes bzhi'i
T02D2578:46a-26: nang na yang mchog gam rtse mor gyur ba ni
T02D2578:46a-27: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes yin te /
T02D2578:46a-28: de yang byang chub sems mngon du gyur pa de nyid yin no //
T02D2578:46a-29: rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thams cad kyi gzhi lam gyi mchog tu bstan pa ni /
T02D2578:46a-30: ji snyed 'phags pa'i rnam grol chos su bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang //
T02D2578:46a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
T02D2578:46a-32: ji snyed du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs te /
T02D2578:46a-33: khams gsum las rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu yon
T02D2578:46a-34: tan gyi chos su bstan cing bsnyad pa de dag
T02D2578:46a-35: thams cad kyang / byang chub sems nyid rdzogs las de yi yon tan de dag de las byung //
T02D2578:46a-36: byang chub kyi sems rdzogs shing mthar phyin par rtogs pa las yon tan rdzogs par 'byung la /
T02D2578:46a-39: yon tan de yang de bzhin du byung zhing thob la /
T02D2578:46a-40: byang chub kyi sems ma rtogs pa rnams la ni /
T02D2578:46a-41: grol ba thar pa chung du tsam yang mi thob ste /
T02D2578:46b-0: @46b de bas na 'di ni grol ba thar ba thams cad kyi gzhi yang yin /
T02D2578:46b-1: 'bras bu mchog grub pa'i lam yin pas thar pa'i lam gyi nang na yang mchog yin no //
T02D2578:46b-3: 'phags pa'i rigs chen 'chi med byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang //
T02D2578:46b-4: nyan thos la sogs 'phags pa'i rigs kun gyi nang na /
T02D2578:46b-6: theg pa chen po ni rigs chen zhes bya ste /
T02D2578:46b-7: bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po la sems pas /
T02D2578:46b-8: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ste /
T02D2578:46b-9: de dag thams cad kyang de med na mi 'byung //
T02D2578:46b-10: de phyir de ni rnam grol mchog gi lam nyid do //
T02D2578:46b-11: byang chub kyi sems de ni de med na byang chub sems dpa' de dag mi 'byung bas /
T02D2578:46b-12: de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems de ni /
T02D2578:46b-13: rnam par grol ba'i lam kun gyi nang na mchog yin no //
T02D2578:46b-15: ci zhig rtogs par bya zhe na /
T02D2578:46b-17: de yang bsam pa dang brjod pa las 'das pas brtags pa'i yul ma yin par bstan te /
T02D2578:46b-18: des na kun du rdo rje sems dpa' ci 'drar bsgom par bya bar 'gyur //
T02D2578:46b-19: gong du bstan pa de ltar phan yon che na /
T02D2578:46b-20: dus dang gnas kun du cis kyang mi shigs la /
T02D2578:46b-21: de rtogs na sgrib pa'i dra ba gcod pas rdo rje ste /
T02D2578:46b-22: sems kyi chos nyid ma nong bar rig pa la rdo rje sems dpa' zhes kyang bya /
T02D2578:46b-23: byang chub kyi sems zhes kyang bya ba ste /
T02D2578:46b-24: sems kyi mtshan nyid ma rig pa'i bla thabs kyi sgo nas /
T02D2578:46b-25: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad du snang la /
T02D2578:46b-26: sems kyi rang bzhin ma nor ba'i rdo rje la sems pa de'i tshe /
T02D2578:46b-27: rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa rnams su yang snang bas /
T02D2578:46b-28: bsgom par bya gang gis ma nor bsgom par 'gyur /
T02D2578:46b-30: phra shing shes dka' dang srong chen po'i lam 'di mi rtog rtog las 'das //
T02D2578:46b-31: blo rtsing zhing shes rab zhen pas mi rtog pas phra zhing shes par dka' ste /
T02D2578:46b-32: bdag dang gzhan dang po'i lam du 'jug cing zhugs
T02D2578:46b-33: pa'i drang srong chen po sangs rgyas kyi lam 'di
T02D2578:46b-34: ni rtog pa'i yul yang ma yin la //
T02D2578:46b-35: mi rtog pa'i yum yang ma yin pas /
T02D2578:46b-36: rtog pa dang mi rtog pa las 'das pa ste /
T02D2578:46b-37: de'i phyir brtag par dka' zhing bstan par dka' la brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral te /
T02D2578:47a-0: @47a * // sems kyis brtag par dka' zhing tshig gis bstan par yang dka' la /
T02D2578:47a-2: tshig de don ma yin pas brjod pa'i tha snyad rnams dang bral ba'i phyir tshig gis mi phebs /
T02D2578:47a-3: gzhan dang byis pa kun gyi spyod yul ma yin yang //
T02D2578:47a-4: don ni tha snyad las 'das pa yin pas /
T02D2578:47a-5: tshig gis mi phebs shing theg pa chen po las gzhan pa nyan thos la sogs pa dang /
T02D2578:47a-6: so so'i skye bo byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul
T02D2578:47a-7: ma yin yang shes shing rtogs par bya ba'i thabs
T02D2578:47a-8: ni yod do // don bzhi pa ston te /
T02D2578:47a-9: de ltar rtogs par bya ba'i thabs yod na gang gis rtogs par bya zhe na /
T02D2578:47a-10: 'khrul ba'i rtog pa ni tshad mam yin pas /
T02D2578:47a-11: 'phags pa dang mkhas pa'i lung dang /
T02D2578:47a-12: dngos po rnams kyi don ji lta bu yin pa /
T02D2578:47a-13: lo rgyus kyis brtags pas rtogs par bya ba ston te /
T02D2578:47a-14: ston pa'i nges pa'i lung dang /
T02D2578:47a-15: bla ma rnams kyi man ngag de nyid don 'dir blta //
T02D2578:47a-16: ston pas bkri ba'i don du ma yin gyi nges pa'i don du bstan pa'i lung dang /
T02D2578:47a-17: bla ma mkhas pa rnams kyis ma nor bar rtogs pa'i nyams kyi man ngag dang /
T02D2578:47a-18: de nyid la ma nor ba'i don du byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa skabs 'dir blta'o //
T02D2578:47a-19: 'khrul pa'i rtog pa tshad ma ma yin par ston te /
T02D2578:47a-20: mngon sum la sogs rgyu yis dngos po 'jig cing grub pa'i mtha' spyod pa //
T02D2578:47a-21: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2578:47a-22: gtan tshigs kyi rgyus kun nas nyon mongs pa dang
T02D2578:47a-23: / rnam par byang ba'i dngos po rnams la 'jig
T02D2578:47a-24: cing spyod de tha mar yod pa zhig du grub
T02D2578:47a-25: / bam / med pa zhig tu grub mtha' ci lta bu zhig 'gyur zhes dpyod pa ni /
T02D2578:47a-26: de nyid rtog pa rgyun 'brangs spyod yul tshad mar gzhag nas blo yis 'jig byed de //
T02D2578:47a-27: gong ma ltar dpyod pa de nyid phyin ci log tu rtog pa'i rgyun gyi rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02D2578:47a-28: nor ba'i rtog pas log par mthong ba'i spyod yul tshad mar bzung nas ;
T02D2578:47a-29: log pa'i blo yis 'jig cing spyod de /
T02D2578:47a-30: dper na thag pa la sprul du mthong ba'i tshe /
T02D2578:47a-31: bdag gis mngon sum du mthong bas ci'i phyir sbrul
T02D2578:47a-32: med ces rang gi 'khrul pa mngon sum tshad mar
T02D2578:47a-33: bzung ba ni tshad mar mi rung ba dang 'dra'o
T02D2578:47b-0: rtog mtha' med phyir dpyod @47b mtha' med de snying po med na tshad ma gang //
T02D2578:47b-1: rtag pa'i sems nyid yang dag pa'i mthar na ji lta bur yang ma grub pa'i phyir /
T02D2578:47b-2: des spyod pa lta ga la yod pas dpyod mtha'
T02D2578:47b-3: med de snying por bya ba ci yang med na
T02D2578:47b-4: tshad mar gang gzhag / de phyir 'jig rten brtags
T02D2578:47b-5: pa'i tha snyad rnal 'byor lam 'dir mi dgos so
T02D2578:47b-6: // tshad mar mi rung ba de'i phyir kun rdzob
T02D2578:47b-7: 'khrul pa snang ba'i dbang du byas pa'i tshe ni
T02D2578:47b-8: // / 'jig rten gyis brtags pa'i tha snyad kyang
T02D2578:47b-9: tshad mar 'jig pa yang yod mod kyi yang dag
T02D2578:47b-10: pa'i don la rnal 'byor du sbyor ba'i lam gyi
T02D2578:47b-11: // / skabs 'dir ni / 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i tha snyad dag mi dgos so //
T02D2578:47b-12: don rnam pa lnga dngos po gang brtags te rtogs par bya zhe na /
T02D2578:47b-14: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2578:47b-15: rnam par byang ba'i dngos po la brtag par bya'o //
T02D2578:47b-16: kun nas nyon mongs pa brtag pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2578:47b-17: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid yin par brtag pa dang 'khrul pa snang bar brtag pa'o //
T02D2578:47b-18: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid yin par brtag pa ni /
T02D2578:47b-19: dngos po mtha' yi rgyu ni lo rgyus dag las lam 'dir brtag par bya //
T02D2578:47b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
T02D2578:47b-21: dngos po rnams kyi grub pa'i mtha' brtag pa'i rgyu
T02D2578:47b-22: ni dngos po nyid kyi lo rgyus ji ltar gnas
T02D2578:47b-23: pa brtags pa ma nor ba'i lam gtan la phab
T02D2578:47b-24: par gyur pas / bla na med pa'i lam tshol ba'i skabs 'dir de ltar brtag par byas te /
T02D2578:47b-25: dper na chu gsher ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D2578:47b-26: chu'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi lo rgyus kyis ston te /
T02D2578:47b-28: rtog pa'i blo dang ldan rnams la //
T02D2578:47b-29: dngos po rnams kyi chos ston te /
T02D2578:47b-30: zhes 'byung ba dang nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2578:47b-31: rnam par byang ba'i dngos po rnams ji lta ba
T02D2578:47b-32: bzhin du rig cing rtog pa nyid ma nor ba'i
T02D2578:47b-33: lam yin pas / dngos po'i lo rgyus brtag pa'i sgo nas lam btsal bar dgos so //
T02D2578:47b-34: skye bo kun gyi sems mngon snang phyi nang grags pa'i chos 'di ni /
T02D2578:47b-35: sems can rnams kyi sems kyis rig cing yul du snang ba'i nang gi dbang po drug dang /
T02D2578:47b-36: phyi'i yul drug yod par grags pa'i chos 'di ni /
T02D2578:47b-37: 'dzin pa drug gis ji ltar mthong zhing brtag pa de ltar ma yin 'khrul //
T02D2578:48a-1: drug gis mthong zhing thos pa la sogs pa dmigs pa'i yul du brtag pa ste /
T02D2578:48a-2: ci snang ba rnams de bzhin yod pa ma yin te 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2578:48a-3: rang gi rtog pas myos pa'i de bzhin bzung ba bden 'gyur na //
T02D2578:48a-4: ma rig pa'i rtog pas myos pa'i log par mthong ba rnams /
T02D2578:48a-5: de bzhin bden par gyur na ni /

T02D2578:57b-25: du ma 'dus pa med par bstan pa'i phyir ro

T02D2578:57b-34: skye dang skye 'gyur skye ba'i rgyun gyis dbang song

T02D2578:58a-0: @58a * // de yang skye phyis kyang skye bar 'gyur te /
T02D2578:58a-1: skye ba'i rgyun mi 'chad pas skye ba'i dbang du song ba'o //
T02D2578:58a-2: rtog mtha' mi shes rtog pas bslus shing rtog pa'i
T02D2578:58a-3: rgyun 'brangs 'khrul pa'i rtog las phyir ldog med gyur
T02D2578:58a-4: pa / sems kyi rtog pa 'di nyid kyis nga
T02D2578:58a-5: dag pa'i mtha' mi shes pas log pa'i rtog pas
T02D2578:58a-6: rang nyid kyis rang bslus te /
T02D2578:58a-7: log pa'i rtog pa rgyun mi 'chad pas /
T02D2578:58a-8: 'khrul pa'i rtog pa las ldog cing yang dag pa'i don shes pa'i dus med par 'gyur ba ni /
T02D2578:58a-9: dper na sgyu mas bslus pa'i ltad mo ba dang /
T02D2578:58a-10: rmi lam gyis bslus pa'i rmi lam dang 'dra ba'i phyir /
T02D2578:58a-11: sgyu ma'i sgyu shes dag gis sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bar sgyu mas rmongs pa'i sgyu ma rnams /
T02D2578:58a-12: rmi lam gyis bslus bzhin du rmi ba'i bde ba
T02D2578:58a-13: nyams shing rmi lam dbang du song bar rmi lam
T02D2578:58a-15: lam 'di spong zhing lam gzhan du bltas pas ma nor lam zhes ston pa de /
T02D2578:58a-16: de dag rdo la gser bzhin thugs rje'i thugs rjes kyi ma'o 'phrogs pa yin /
T02D2578:58a-17: gong du ji skad pa stan pa'i lam 'di spong
T02D2578:58a-18: zhing theg pa chen po'i lam ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2578:58a-19: ma lcogs te / mthar ltung ba'i skyon dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2578:58a-20: theg pa chen po'i lam las gzhan du 'gyur ba
T02D2578:58a-21: lta ba sna tshogs kyis lam du bltas pas ma
T02D2578:58a-22: nor ba'i zhes ston pa de ni dper na rdo
T02D2578:58a-23: las gser zhes zer ba dang 'dra ste /
T02D2578:58a-24: thugs rjer rung zhing 'phags pa thugs rje mnga' ba
T02D2578:58a-25: rnams kyi thugs rjes rang dbang med par gdung ba
T02D2578:58a-26: skye ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2578:58a-27: dper na yid du 'ong ba'i yul la sems yengs te /
T02D2578:58a-28: 'jug pa la rang dbang med pa las /
T02D2578:58a-30: sems 'phrogs zhes brjod pa dang 'dra bar thugs rje mnga' ba rnams thugs rjes sems 'phrogs te /
T02D2578:58a-31: rang dbang med par gdung ba skye ba la thugs rjes 'phrogs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2578:58a-32: shin tu ma sbyangs pa'i dus kyis mnar pa'i skye bo lnga brgya tha ma la /
T02D2578:58a-33: gsung rab dri med rtogs dka' dag la sgra bzhin spyod dang tshul bzhin med //
T02D2578:58a-34: shes rab kyi blo ma sbyangs pas dus kyis mnar te lnga brgya tha ma la /
T02D2578:58a-35: chos la dpyod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2578:58a-36: gsung rab ma nor ba dri ma med par bstan
T02D2578:58a-37: pa'i don rtogs par dka' ba rnams la ci skad
T02D2578:58b-0: bstan pa'i sgra bzhin du dpyod cing @58b 'dzin gyi
T02D2578:58b-1: / don gyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin dpyod par mi byed de /
T02D2578:58b-2: don ni mun khung na gser 'dug pa dang 'ad [*'dra?]/
T02D2578:58b-3: tshig ni sgron ma dang mtshungs te /
T02D2578:58b-4: tshig gi sgron mas don gyi gser btsal ba yin gyis kyang /
T02D2578:58b-5: ji ltar sgron ma de gser ma yin pa bzhin du tshig ni don ma yin par shes te /
T02D2578:58b-6: tshig la don gyi ngo bor gzung ba dang /
T02D2578:58b-7: rab kyi blo stobs bzhin 'jug pa la sogs pa
T02D2578:58b-8: lta ba sna tshogs dag / mi shes chu bso
T02D2578:58b-9: g-yengs shing gsung gi nyid gu bdud rtsi rnal 'byor
T02D2578:58b-10: bral // rang gi 'khrul pa'i blo gros kyi stobs
T02D2578:58b-11: kyi rang don spyod pa la 'jug pa rnams kyis
T02D2578:58b-12: phyin ci log gi lta ba sna tshogs bzung ba
T02D2578:58b-13: ni mi shes pa'i lta pa'i chu bos g-yengs te
T02D2578:58b-14: khyer bas de bzhin gshegs pas nges pa'i don du
T02D2578:58b-15: gsungs pa'i gsung rab bdud rtsi dang 'dra ba la
T02D2578:58b-16: ma nor bar rnal 'byor du sbyor zhing bsgom pa
T02D2578:58b-18: don bcu gnyis pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba ni /
T02D2578:58b-19: de'i phyir rgyal bas gsungs pa'i lam mchog thugs kyi gsang ba dam pa ni //
T02D2578:58b-20: kun du rgyal ba rnams kyi spyod yul thun mong ma yin yang //
T02D2578:58b-21: sangs rgyas rnams kyis ci ltar mkhyen pa ltar //
T02D2578:58b-22: slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis kyang shes pa ma yin pas thun mong ma yin yang /
T02D2578:58b-23: goms pa'i mthu yis mi 'ga' tshul du tshad ma dag las rab bsgrubs te /
T02D2578:58b-24: sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi gsang ba yang dag
T02D2578:58b-25: pa'i don la slob dpon nyid kyis yun ring du
T02D2578:58b-27: bsgoms pa'i mthu dang lung dang man ngag gi tshad ma dag gis gtan la phab ste /
T02D2578:58b-28: 'gro ba'i don du mi gnyis lam mchog 'di ni rab bgyis pas //
T02D2578:58b-29: skye ba'i skye gnas thams cad du yang skad cig tu //
T02D2578:58b-30: mi mthun phyogs kyis mi nyams rgyal ba kun gyi
T02D2578:58b-31: thugs 'dir rab rgyas shog /'gro ba'i don du gnyis
T02D2578:58b-32: su med pa dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi
T02D2578:58b-33: gshegs shul / lam gyi mchog 'di mdor bstan cing
T02D2578:58b-34: bgyis pas sems can thams cad kyi dus dang gnas
T02D2578:58b-35: skabs thams cad du mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad
T02D2578:58b-36: kyis yang dag pa'i bsam pa mi nyams shing sangs
T02D2578:58b-37: rgyas thams cad kyi thugs su chud pa'i don gyi
T02D2578:58b-38: gshegs shul / snying po 'di / sems can thams

T02D2578:58b-40: gshegs shul / snying po 'di / ba yin no
T02D2578:58b-41: // byams pa'i zhal bzang mngon du ma mthong yang
T02D2578:59a-0: gshegs shul / snying po 'di / ba yin no // / thugs rje @59a * //
T02D2578:59a-1: man ngag brgyud pa'i ser bu yis //
T02D2578:59a-2: 'khrul gdong gting nas bdag blo zer bskyed pa //
T02D2578:59a-3: 'jam dpal 'jam dpal bshes gnyen bcas la 'dud //
T02D2578:59a-4: long ba la yang dmigs su tshol //
T02D2578:59a-5: mi mthong bzhin du'ang mtshon par stsol //

T02D2578:59a-9: 'on kyang rgyu med phan pa'i sems kyis mi shes skyon yang yang du blangs nas su //
